title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Intent to Designate Individual to a Key Administration Post â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
July 18, 2019
Today, President Donald J. Trump announced his intent to designate the following individual to a key position in his Administration:James J. Sullivan, Jr., of Pennsylvania, to be designated Chairman of the Occupational Safety and Health Review Commission.
